data.title: Capstone Project - Data Labelling using Generative AI
data.text: This project and report explores the application of generative AI for data labelling in intrusion detection systems (IDS) within Internet of Things (IOT) environment.

data.title: 'Help the Robot' Pathfinding Project
data.text: Develop an intelligent agent that navigates a topographic map to find an optimal path from a starting point to a destination using various search algorithms.

data.title: Graph Algorithms - K-Shortest Loopless Paths
data.text: Efficiently finding the K-shortest loopless paths in a directed graph from a source to a destination vertex.

data.title: Portfolio Website
data.text: The portfolio website you're looking at right now, with a responsive design that highlights my experience and interests.
